raw_text: Theunigrams used for sentence/headline classification were learned from WordNet (Fellbaum, 1998) dictionary entries using the STEP system described in (Andreevskaia and Bergler, 2006b)

raw_text: Since sentiment-bearing words in English have different degree of centrality to the category of sentiment, we have constructed a measure of word centrality to the category of positive or negative sentiment described in our earlier work (Andreevskaiaand Bergler, 2006a)

raw_text: Moreover, AndreevskaiaandBergler (2006) show that the performance of automatic annotation of subjectivity at the word level can be hurt by the presence of subjectivity-ambiguous words in the training sets they use

raw_text: However, Kim and Hovy (2004) and Andreevskaiaand Bergler (2006) show that subjectivity recognition might be the harder problem with lower human agreement and automatic performance
